    • Method Detail

      • getSideBarViewModel

        protected abstract com.codename1.rad.models.Entity getSideBarViewModel()

        Gets the view model used to build the sidebar. The view model should include Thing.name and Thing.thumbnailUrl in order to show the user profile.

        Returns:
        A view model for the sidebar.

      • createSideBarView

        protected com.codename1.ui.Component createSideBarView()

        Creates the sidebar component. The sidebar is only created for top-level forms, with no back command. Default implementation uses getSideBarViewModel() as the view model to create an instance of TWTSideBarView.

        Returns:

      • setView

        public void setView(com.codename1.ui.Component cmp)
        Overrides:
        setView in class com.codename1.rad.controllers.FormController
